reviews.review:
Well, if you think you have seen everything, NO! just take a look inside CSS world and you will find a new and crazy shit. 
-Zombies
-Shitty skins
-Sprays that show an infinite amount of nude pics
-Bad admins
-5 year old guys.

If that don't convince you, you will have to think twice dude.
10/10 Like Skyrim with guns.
urpau'Te co MHou' u MouMu Dpy3b9Mu, He no}|{eJIeeTe=)
Le bon vieux counter strike source superbe jeux encore et toujours le meilleur jeux FPS mulijoueur en ligne pour des bon moment entre amis.

Mam rád  to lopaťáctví. Proletariát odejde z provozoven, učňáků a nonstopů, aby se společně sešel u několika kol starýho dobrýho céeska. Zanadává se na blockery, lamy a debilní mapy. Přes voice se dohodí kontakt na Volvo, který má najeto jen dvakrát kolem koule. Taky si poslechnu nový hlášky, který stejně za pár minut hned zapomenu. Mam to rád.

Je trouve que ce jeux est complet :

- Des mods en veut tu en voila 
- Des maps wtf 
- Du fun 
- De la compétition toujours sympa en team 
- Le moteur graphique qui était sympa pour l'époque 

Je rédige ce commentaire aujourd'hui donc certains critères sont a oublier comme la compétition, qui n'est presque plus présente mais y'a encore moyen de s'amuser dessus.
You meet Girls and have sex with them on the same day !! its the best (Y)
Отличная игра, нужны и мозги и реакция.
aaaaaah ... it is so good ... cant stop ... sorry cs go ... you can stay though but you will be treated like the step cousin who smells a bit .... ratatatatatatatatat
Probably the best counters strike. Has a lot of fun maps and modes and its not all noob friendly so thats hwy i like it
det er et mega fedt spil til alle dem der ikke har købt det jeg syntes i burde prøve det

The master of the modded fps, now more of a platformer with its widely-known Zombie Escape mod is really fun and whether it be to grow a garden or become a wizard. This game has it all maps wide from Helms-deep to the mushroom kingdom, you can fight, take flight or even sit around in a tycoon match of giant monopoly.
Хоть и на дворе 2к17, но в эту игру никто не перестанет играть.

No need for a huge review. It's just the BEST. GAME. EVER.

9001/10
其实换了引擎还是原来的风味 原来的精神
das beste spiel das ich kenn *-*
Get it you dirty white mutts.

Думаю объяснять ничего не надо, это - лучший сетевой шутер в которой я играл (лично моё мнение, сравнивать с Battlefield 3 не надо). С ботами играть не интересно, а вот на Стимовских серверах стоит поиграть. Игра достойна покупки, а лучше купить ''Counter-Strike: Complete''.
Great game.  Easy to play...fun to play.

LIES 

There is no point in this game where you get to smash kitchen counters with your fists

El mejor que ha existido y el mejor que existirá nunca, no hay shotter que le haga sombra que se le parezca, aunque si buscas algo mas el Battlefield 3 es lo que buscas xD le pongo un 10 por los muchos años que ha estado al pie del cañón.

Counter Strike Souce ist ein Classicer,schon etwas älter,aber wird noch sehr gerne 
gespielt.
Counter - Strike: Sourse безусловно мировая игра, находящаяся практически на каждом компьютере. У кого ее еще нет качайте и присоединяйтесь..
awesome game! :) I recommend Zombie, Bhop and Jailbreak :)

A truly captivating multiplayer experience. Full of fun and groups of enjoyable people, it is no wonder why CSS is a beloved Valve title. I sank hundreds of hours into this title and would again easily. So many gamemodes and not your generic COD gameplay make this really fun. Please buy this, full price or not. But be sure to buy the Garry's Mod bundle.
This thing should stay in the past, absolute garbage of a game.
AWESOME GAME! But it is hard on noobs! Learn how to play it then the multiplayer is a piece of cake.
Counter Strike Source ist und bleibt  der beste Ego Shooter der Welt
Jogo muito bom, a jogabilidade é um pouco diferente comparada com o CS 1.6 e o GO, porem dá pra se acostumar.
если приноровиться то заебись) "Каждому- свое", как говориться!!!
Играю за Т - ищу М16,играю за СТ - ищу АК.
You have to buy this and install it in order to get the full experience of Garry's Mod.
Pew Pew Pew, shootin bustas in they dome fo money. Ballin.
Bought a 10k PC for This game
best counter strike game ever.......... and yes i did write this after global offensive.
Тут что-то излишне говорить, это контра. Мир эмоций, море мата от побеждённых и насмешливые комментарии профессионалов.
Pecková hra :) Doporučuju .... nejlepší ze série COUNTER STRIKE :)
Не считаю данную игру достойной перехода с кс 1.6, оставила равнодушными многих игроков кс 1.6.
DOUBLE KILL HEADSHOT DOMINATING! M-M-MMMONSTER KILL
Il est vivement recommander même si tout le monde y joue déjà ^^
it has guns and stuff. i feel my life is complete and i require all the counterstrikes to get the dragon to grant me my one wish, to counterstrike until the cows go moo.
The Best Game in the World..........Recommended!
